00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <stdlib.h>
00025 #include <string.h>
00026 
00027 #include "enum.hpp"
00028 
00029 namespace uStreamLib {
00030         Enumeration::Enumeration(void)
00031                 : Object(UOSUTIL_RTTI_ENUMERATION), m_peiItems(NULL), m_uCount(0),
00032                 m_uSize(0), m_uCurItem(0), m_peiCur(NULL)
00033         {
00034                 // nothing to do
00035         }
00036 
00037         Enumeration::~Enumeration(void)
00038         {
00039                 if (m_peiItems)
00040                         ::free(m_peiItems);
00041         }
00042 
00043         int32 Enumeration::init(uint32 size)
00044         {
00045                 uint32 sz = sizeof(EnumItem) * size;
00046                 m_peiItems = NULL;
00047 
00048                 if (sz) {
00049                         m_peiItems = (EnumItem *) malloc(sz);
00050                         if (!m_peiItems)
00051                                 return FAILURE;
00052 
00053                         memset(m_peiItems, 0, sz);
00054                 }
00055 
00056                 m_uSize = size;
00057                 m_uCount = 0;
00058                 m_uCurItem = 0;
00059                 m_peiCur = m_peiItems;
00060 
00061                 setOk(true);
00062                 return SUCCESS;
00063         }
00064 
00065         void* Enumeration::nextElement(uint32* item_size)
00066         {
00067                 void* retval = NULL;
00068 
00069                 *item_size = m_peiCur->size;
00070                 retval = m_peiCur->value;
00071 
00072                 m_uCurItem += 1;
00073                 m_peiCur += 1;
00074 
00075                 return retval;
00076         }
00077 
00078         void Enumeration::addElement(void* item, uint32 size)
00079         {
00080                 uint32 new_size = m_uSize + m_uSize / 4;
00081                 uint32 memsize = new_size * sizeof(EnumItem);
00082 
00083                 if (m_uCount >= m_uSize) {
00084                         m_peiItems = (EnumItem *) ::realloc(m_peiItems, memsize);
00085                         if (!m_peiItems)
00086                                 return;
00087 
00088                         m_uSize = new_size;
00089                 }
00090 
00091                 m_peiItems[m_uCurItem].value = item;
00092                 m_peiItems[m_uCurItem].size = size;
00093 
00094                 m_uCount += 1;
00095                 m_uCurItem += 1;
00096                 m_peiCur += 1;
00097         }
00098 }
